title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Code to Market: Build and Launch AI Agents on AWS Marketplace (ISV314)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从代码到市场：在 AWS Marketplace 上构建和发布 AI 代理 (ISV314)
abstract: Creating AI agents is just the beginning – ISVs face the greater challenge of monetizing them effectively. In this CodeTalk you will learn how to implement metering APIs, manage licensing, and navigate ISV-specific requirements using two deployment approaches: containers based agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore running in customer environments, and API-based agents hosted by ISVs. Join this session to accelerate your AI solutions from development to revenue-generating products in AWS Marketplace.
abstract_cn: 创建AI代理只是开始——ISV面临的更大挑战是如何有效地将其货币化。在本次CodeTalk中，您将学习如何实现计量API、管理许可证，以及使用两种部署方式应对ISV特定需求：基于容器的代理（使用在客户环境中运行的Amazon Bedrock AgentCore）和由ISV托管的基于API的代理。加入本次会议，加速您的AI解决方案从开发到AWS Marketplace上创收产品的转变。
